title: Extract Document Outline
cap_description: Extract document outline/table of contents with hierarchical structure

required.name: file_path
required.arg_description: Path to the document file to process

optional.name: include_order_indexes
optional.arg_description: Include page numbers in the outline (default: true)

optional.name: output
optional.arg_description: Write output to specified file instead of stdout

output.output_description: Hierarchical document outline with section titles and optional page numbers
